revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Samsung |model=SmartThings Hub |revision=v3 (STH-ETH-300) |asin=B07FJGGWJL |est_release_date=08/2018 |fcc_date=04/27/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=smart home hub, IoT hub |fcc_id=2AF4S-STH-ETH-300 |ic_id=20753-STHETH300 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=i.MX6ULL;MCIMX6Y, 1DVM05AA; |cpu1_cspeed=528 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLM4G1FEPD |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B1G1646 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=Bluetooth, Z-Wave, ZigBee, Thread, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|SmartThings Home Hub}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.smartthings.com/products}}
Also referred to by Samsung as the ''SmartThings Hub (2018)'' :or with model number IM6001-V3.
"HUB_V3P0_V0P7_DRAFT" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
===Links=== *[https://support.smartthings.com/hc/en-us/articles/207477083-Which-version-of-the-Hub-do-I-have- ''Which version of the Hub do I have?''] (Not updated with v3 yet)
